txt.en: 'Since you are so persistent, perhaps I can put you to some use. The Elders have asked us to gather supplies while we are out here on watch. I personally would rather be in my hut with my wife keeping warm.\n\n'Do you think you can help me then? We need to collect shells from the beetles in the area. We use their shells for armour and cooking, and their meat is passable. But the shells are what we are looking for... undamaged, of course. Bring them to me when you are done.'
'Impressive. This will make my time here go much more quickly. Thank you.\n\n'Perhaps there is more to you than there seems, Duvodiad. My wife will be happy when I return home sooner than usual.'
'Shells. We need shells from beetles. It is not black powder magic... just kill beetles and harvest their shells.'
As you entered the Dunbog, you stumbled across the Avanc-lûth. You clearly get the sense that these people do not like strangers, nor do they want you anywhere within their bog.
Talk to Alun at the scouts' camp
Bog-beetles can be found in the Dunbog. Alun is encamped in the north-eastern part of the Dunbog.\n\nAlun has asked you to gather beetle-shells for the Avanc-lûth and bring them to him.
